archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Prioritize Service Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process is responsible for assigning the prioritization to service problem in order to establish an order for managing it. The prioritization is assigned (usually automatically) according to criteria, such as, categorization, services affected and SLAs. Extended Description This process is responsible for assigning the prioritization to service problem in order to establish an order for managing it. The prioritization is assigned (usually automatically) according to criteria, such as, categorization, services affected and SLAs. Explanatory Reserved for future use.
